channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here Are The Exact ‘ARC Raiders’ Launch Times In Your Region
item.description: This is when ARC Raiders releases in your region, with exact times based on time zones. And you can pre-download now everywhere but one place.

item.title: Nvidia is officially the world’s first $5 trillion company. CEO Jensen Huang says it’s on track for ‘half a trillion dollars’ in revenue
item.description: Nvidia reached the $5 trillion threshold just three months after becoming the first company to hit $4 trillion.

item.title: Aurora Alert: Northern Lights Could Dazzle 12 States Tonight
item.description: The Northern Lights may be visible in the U.S. this week, following a geomagnetic storm forecast by space weather experts at NOAA.

item.title: HKEX CEO Bonnie Chan says global stock exchanges have to work together to stay relevant in a crypto age
item.description: "We're entering a stage where exchanges are not really competing with one another, but working together," HKEX CEO Bonnie Chan said.

item.title: AI Video Startup Synthesia Valued At $4 Billion In New $200 Million Raise
item.description: Alphabet’s venture firm GV is leading the round, which nearly doubles Synthesia’s valuation, per three sources.

item.title: Chanel’s CEO went to Microsoft HQ and asked ChatGPT to show her a picture of her company’s leadership. They were all men in suits
item.description: Leena Nair said more than 75% of her company’s employees are female.

item.title: ‘Move Over’ Laws Help Keep First Responders Safe, But Aren’t Followed
item.description: Laws to require drivers to move over and slow down for emergency vehicles have been on the books for several decades, but enforcement is inconsistent ...

item.title: Ben & Jerry’s co-founder says Unilever 'stopped' ice cream company from creating a 'flavor for Palestine'
item.description: Ben & Jerry's co-founder Ben Cohen said he is creating his own Palestinian-themed ice cream after Unilever allegedly "stopped" the company from making...

item.title: AI doesn’t fail on tech—it fails on leadership
item.description: Moving beyond the AI hype cycle toward the autonomous enterprise starts with intentional leadership.

item.title: UPS CFO on Amazon pullback and driving a growth strategy
item.description: Brian Dykes explains why UPS is prioritizing profitability over volume, and how refocusing its network is delivering results.

item.title: How Businesses Can Prepare For Human-AI Work In The Intelligence Age
item.description: As AGI approaches, experts say the future of work isn’t about replacement but collaboration where humans and AI together to redefine intelligence and ...

Amazon to cut around 14K corporate jobs
item.description: Amazon will eliminate 14,000 corporate positions through internal restructuring, joining over 200 tech companies that cut 98,000 jobs this year.

item.title: The Fed 5: Bessent's short list for Powell's job
item.description: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's term ends in May 2026, but that isn't stopping Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent from moving ahead with finding h...

item.title: Federal Reserve faces dilemma amid expected rate cut decision
item.description: The Federal Reserve is expected to cut interest rates 25-basis-points at its meeting this week, though elevated inflation has created a dilemma for po...

item.title: Social Security COLA for 2026 revealed following shutdown-related delay
item.description: The Social Security Administration revealed its annual cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) for 2026, which is going to boost benefits by 2.8% next year t...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
